channel.title: How dead have these forums become?
channel.description: [center][b]I just came back after a 8 month break or so, and I'm just now realizing that it's died down a lot. Info please?[/b][/center]

item.title: How dead have these forums become?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Useless thread is useless. This is simply a spamfest.

Read full topic
item.source: How dead have these forums become?

item.title: How dead have these forums become?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

dawsonsmokes:

Look at the damn features Vbulletin has. Also easy to crack yeah goodluck cracking it getting reported then vbulletins on your ass in court knocking every penny out of you like they do to everybody who cracks it. Also the looks are much nicer I use SMF I know the features it has. It’s not nearly as many as Vbulletin SMF I bet you if you went to a forum rater website who actually get paid to rank forums vbulletin would be top outdated my ass lmao

If you have any clue what you’re doing all those features can be included by just writing the code for them. You have no idea what you’re talking about so stop trying to act like you do. vBulletin aren’t going to sue anyone for cracking a forum that they sold to a 3rd party. Get a brain and then learn to use it, then maybe you can come back and tell me your thoughts.

EDIT: To anyone wondering, I didn’t infract him. Myself and another mod were working through the reports and he happened to get this one.

Read full topic
item.source: How dead have these forums become?

item.title: How dead have these forums become?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“dawsonsmokes, post:12, topic:525781”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=644518.msg4336681#msg4336681 date=1374491031]

Forums are dying but whatever. No one tries to improve anything so it will continue to die. Rune-server ftw gotta love kevy. Mopars for noobs hehe

You know the only reason r-s is up is because Kevy got flamed out of Mopar, also r-s is full of morons.
[/quote]

Mopar probably makes over 1k a month easily yet their still using SMF free forums ? yet rune server least has vulletin paid forums. Also rune-server is organized a lot nicer. Easier to find and there is a lot of nice people at r-s just saying that now I have met a lot of nice people even from my country I reside in Canada. Yes I agree there is a lot of retards out but there is everywhere you go look at artik here bitching at everyone or vain there is always morons everywhere you go remember this

YOU CANNOT FIX STUPID, STUPIDITY IS NOT MEANT TO BE TOUCHED[/quote]
In your logic we should use vBulletin (which btw is incredibly outdated, their code is fudgeing atrocious) which is probably the easiest software in the world to crack. Their password is hashed using MD5 for christ sake. Not to mention that just because a forum is paid that apparently means it’s better? No. SMF is much nicer software and more up-to-date. You’re just another retarded kid who thinks because something costs a couple hundred dollars that it’s better. Leave.

Read full topic
item.source: How dead have these forums become?

item.title: How dead have these forums become?
item.dc:creator: @dawsonsmokes dawsonsmokes
item.description:
@dawsonsmokes wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:23, topic:525781”]I thought the history of Moparscape was pretty obvious itself but yet again I have to dumb it down. Moparisthebest itself is enough history to wipe out anything Rune-Server has ever claimed, without Moparscape there would be no Rune-Server. People who lead or led Moparscape/Moparisthebest date back to kaitnieks, though I am not that old so I cannot give you anything that was done back then. I also fail to see the point how a successful server is being a part of history, now don’t get me wrong I did just check out the features of that server and yet again it is all the same which can only prove that it was just popular, in no way did it seem Oscar worthy. As a disclaimer, if you knew me then you’d know that I like to debate even if the odds aren’t in my favor, which I’m quite certain they are even with my inexperience with the history of RSPS, more or less the history of Rune-Server, if it even has any.

Oh, and if you don’t mind. I have an episode of Supernatural to catch up on. Cherio.[/quote]

You do have a point without mopar there would be no rune-server and runelocus ect but I am sure someone would of thought about it eventually. Pretty positive someone would of.

Read full topic
item.source: How dead have these forums become?

item.title: How dead have these forums become?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I thought the history of Moparscape was pretty obvious itself but yet again I have to dumb it down. Moparisthebest itself is enough history to wipe out anything Rune-Server has ever claimed, without Moparscape there would be no Rune-Server. People who lead or led Moparscape/Moparisthebest date back to kaitnieks, though I am not that old so I cannot give you anything that was done back then. I also fail to see the point how a successful server is being a part of history, now don’t get me wrong I did just check out the features of that server and yet again it is all the same which can only prove that it was just popular, in no way did it seem Oscar worthy. As a disclaimer, if you knew me then you’d know that I like to debate even if the odds aren’t in my favor, which I’m quite certain they are even with my inexperience with the history of RSPS, more or less the history of Rune-Server, if it even has any.

Oh, and if you don’t mind. I have an episode of Supernatural to catch up on. Cherio.

Read full topic
item.source: How dead have these forums become?

item.title: How dead have these forums become?
item.dc:creator: @dawsonsmokes dawsonsmokes
item.description:
@dawsonsmokes wrote:

Instead of trying to suck up on a thread actually point out history tell me the history funny thing is hades5 well known server started off at rune-server same with PIM from soulsplit so don’t go pointing fingers like you know info. Get some of your facts straight both forums are succuesful in 2 different ways

Read full topic
item.source: How dead have these forums become?

item.title: How dead have these forums become?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“dawsonsmokes, post:17, topic:525781”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=644518.msg4336707#msg4336707 date=1374496863]

That dump? lmao rune-server has been more succuesful then mopar. Plus it hasn’t even been out as long :L don’t get me wrong I like both

Yes that dump. Rune-Server successful? Well why dont we count the real programming gurus and compare. For the short amount of time I was over at Rune-Server I would not see one person who actually knew what they were talking about when it came to programming, I seen repetitive sources over and over with very little ever added, in other words Rune-Server has always been what MoparScape is now. As for money and traffic wise, well yeah any kid gets attracted to shiny medals and badges and any spoiled little kid with mommies credit card will buy those shiny badges. But if you look over here, Moparisthebest aims for something more professional and he actually knows what he is doing compared to Kevy who left here because he was so butt hurt. If you’re looking for real success in history then MoparScape or more preferably Moparisthebest is easily the winner.
[/quote]

I can name about 5 servers that never advertised on mopar that have been succuesful through rune-server. Just pointing that out there. Also why use a SMF forums if your bringing in that much money why don’t you upgrade and give people what they want I use SMF and I am upgrading to vbulletin. Yet I know I don’t make as much as mopar does just from adverts…[/quote]
Okay I didn’t think I had to but I’ll dumb it down for you, again. What has Rune-Server ever done to contribute to RSPS history, nothing. SMF can do exactly what vBulletin can and you don’t have to pay shit all. Also “the people” who demand for looks are as I have already said, the kids who want shiny things. MoparScape serves (served) one purpose, RSPS and not shiny badges or looks. Now please, you’re fighting a losing battle and now it’s just sad because you’re making yourself look like one of those shiny demanding kids. We can probably go as far to say that MoparScape has history and Rune-Server has… shiny badges.

Read full topic
item.source: How dead have these forums become?

item.title: How dead have these forums become?
item.dc:creator: @dawsonsmokes dawsonsmokes
item.description:
@dawsonsmokes wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:19, topic:525781”]There’s still a fair amount of people who joined 1, 2 or 3 years ago and on top of that, most of the veterans are still around aswell.
If any, I think the newcomers jump out of the community as soon as they get into it. They come here for help and we point them elsewhere (which is good, imo). This is mainly a programmer’s forum (you could tell me it’s an RSPS forum, but the development is basically programming) so I do believe that we have a good amount of people who know what they’re doing. I rather have a small community of lazy smartasses then a clsuterfudge of dipshits.
But eh, it’s MITB’s choice even though he’s never active (at least, to us. I’m sure he does alot behind the scenes). These forums aren’t going anywhere any time soon.[/quote]
Well said and you know what you are talking about there is a lot of individuals here who know what they are doing. I respect them for that as well all forums have dumbasses though that’s probably a proven fact. It’s not really that dead though.

Read full topic
item.source: How dead have these forums become?

item.title: How dead have these forums become?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

There’s still a fair amount of people who joined 1, 2 or 3 years ago and on top of that, most of the veterans are still around aswell.
If any, I think the newcomers jump out of the community as soon as they get into it. They come here for help and we point them elsewhere (which is good, imo). This is mainly a programmer’s forum (you could tell me it’s an RSPS forum, but the development is basically programming) so I do believe that we have a good amount of people who know what they’re doing. I rather have a small community of lazy smartasses then a clsuterfuck of dipshits.
But eh, it’s MITB’s choice even though he’s never active (at least, to us. I’m sure he does alot behind the scenes). These forums aren’t going anywhere any time soon.

Read full topic

For the short amount of time I was over at Rune-Server I would not see one person who actually knew what they were talking about when it came to programming, I seen repetitive sources over and over with very little ever added, in other words Rune-Server has always been what MoparScape is now. But if you look over here, Moparisthebest aims for something more professional and he actually knows what he is doing compared to Kevy who left here because he was so butt hurt. If you’re looking for real success in history then MoparScape or more preferably Moparisthebest is easily the winner.[/quote]

Also why use a SMF forums if your bringing in that much money why don’t you upgrade and give people what they want I use SMF and I am upgrading to vbulletin. Yet I know I don’t make as much as mopar does just from adverts…

item.title: How dead have these forums become?
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:9, topic:525781”]I joined this community late 2010, and just before 2011. It was really alive when I joined, people where trolling, I remember everyone as senior member alike myself atm, but I agree on the forums dying down, I do realise some of our members are over at R-S, we must be missing something that is included in every other rsps forum.

Despite all mentioned above, I love this forum, the community is great and you know how to get along with the guys and girls silab here.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How dead have these forums become?
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

I joined this community late 2010, and just before 2011. It was really alive when I joined, people where trolling, I remember everyone as senior member alike myself atm, but I agree on the forums dying down, I do realise some of our members are over at R-S, we must be missing something that is included in every other rsps forum.

Despite all mentioned above, I love this forum, the community is great and you know how to get along with the guys and girls here.
